header.name: Juelich
header.description: The Juelich Histological Atlas from the FSL program -- A probabilistic atlas created by averaging multi-subject post-mortem cyto- and myelo-architectonic segmentations, performed by the team of Profs Zilles and Amunts at the Research Center Jülich and kindly provided by Simon Eickhoff.
